Summary: I swa a quick white cigar shaped object flying high, then disappearing.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving North through Abington Pa on Easton Rd, I was marveling at the clear blue sky when I saw a small white cigar shaped object high in the sky, proceeding west. At first I thought it was a jet, but it was flying much faster than I had seen jets fly. I stopped at a traffic light at Edge Hill Rd, and watched the object continue west. I then saw the object brighten, fade, brighten again, fade again, then disappear. There were no clouds nearby for it to fly into, the sky was clear and almost cloud free, as it was the morning after a storm. The brightening and fading were what I would expect to see as an object turned or rotated, reflecting the sun. My reaction could best be described as intrigued, in a "Huh. Look at that." sort of way.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Abington
There were no other sightings in Abington on or around June 24th 2007
